<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExtBits = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> - SrcBitWidth;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  KnownBits Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  Result.One = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a> &lt;&lt; ExtBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  Result.Zero = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a> &lt;&lt; ExtBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">  Result.One.ashrInPlace(ExtBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  Result.Zero.ashrInPlace(ExtBits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Count the number of leading bit positions where our underlying value is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// known to be less than or equal to Val.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a> | Val).<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8d92de57590536d2f254fe5e903e3372">countl&#95;one</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each of those bit positions, if Val has a 1 in that bit then our</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a5120eaa394627e6c1ec3d66ef77947cd"><Highlight kind="normal">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a5120eaa394627e6c1ec3d66ef77947cd">KnownBits::umax</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownBits &amp;RHS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we can prove that LHS &gt;= RHS then use LHS as the result. Likewise for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// RHS. Ideally our caller would already have spotted these cases and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// optimized away the umax operation, but we handle them here for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// completeness.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.getMinValue().uge(RHS.getMaxValue()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LHS;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RHS.getMinValue().uge(LHS.getMaxValue()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RHS;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the result of the umax is LHS then it must be greater than or equal to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the minimum possible value of RHS. Likewise for RHS. Any known bits that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are common to these two values are also known in the result.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">  KnownBits L = LHS.makeGE(RHS.getMinValue());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">  KnownBits R = RHS.makeGE(LHS.getMinValue());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> L.intersectWith(R);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9c1c6dc178ce30e4a6c09f5c08727d65">computeForAddSub</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Add=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NSW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NUW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, RHS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">                            LHS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// By construction, the subtraction in abdu never has unsigned overflow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the common bits between (sub nuw LHS, RHS) and (sub nuw RHS, LHS).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">  KnownBits Diff0 =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9c1c6dc178ce30e4a6c09f5c08727d65">computeForAddSub</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Add=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NSW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NUW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, LHS, RHS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">  KnownBits Diff1 =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9c1c6dc178ce30e4a6c09f5c08727d65">computeForAddSub</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Add=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NSW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NUW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, RHS, LHS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Diff0.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a76e45a40f2f0b5b09132d1de119765e8">intersectWith</a>(Diff1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a864f5b0ab8f1fa7249cf280e6b572620"><Highlight kind="normal">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a864f5b0ab8f1fa7249cf280e6b572620">KnownBits::abds</a>(KnownBits LHS, KnownBits RHS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we know which argument is larger, return (sub LHS, RHS) or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (sub RHS, LHS) directly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.getSignedMinValue().sge(RHS.getSignedMaxValue()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9c1c6dc178ce30e4a6c09f5c08727d65">computeForAddSub</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Add=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NSW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NUW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, LHS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">                            RHS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RHS.getSignedMinValue().sge(LHS.getSignedMaxValue()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9c1c6dc178ce30e4a6c09f5c08727d65">computeForAddSub</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Add=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NSW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NUW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, RHS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">                            LHS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift both arguments from the signed range to the unsigned range, e.g. from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#91;-0x80, 0x7F&#93; to &#91;0, 0xFF&#93;. This allows us to use &quot;sub nuw&quot; below just like</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// abdu does.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that we can&#39;t just use &quot;sub nsw&quot; instead because abds has signed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inputs but an unsigned result, which makes the overflow conditions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// different.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SignBitPosition = LHS.getBitWidth() - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Arg : &#123;&amp;LHS, &amp;RHS&#125;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Tmp = Arg-&gt;Zero&#91;SignBitPosition&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">    Arg-&gt;Zero.setBitVal(SignBitPosition, Arg-&gt;One&#91;SignBitPosition&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">    Arg-&gt;One.setBitVal(SignBitPosition, Tmp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the common bits between (sub nuw LHS, RHS) and (sub nuw RHS, LHS).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">  KnownBits Diff0 =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9c1c6dc178ce30e4a6c09f5c08727d65">computeForAddSub</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Add=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NSW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NUW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, LHS, RHS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">  KnownBits Diff1 =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9c1c6dc178ce30e4a6c09f5c08727d65">computeForAddSub</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Add=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NSW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NUW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, RHS, LHS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Diff0.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a76e45a40f2f0b5b09132d1de119765e8">intersectWith</a>(Diff1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278" lineLink="#aa18696894909136556d40020664aefe1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#aa18696894909136556d40020664aefe1">getMaxShiftAmount</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;MaxValue, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is only an approximate upper bound.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ae9ffa8b50ca6095202b2e8e7686c10b8"><Highlight kind="normal">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ae9ffa8b50ca6095202b2e8e7686c10b8">KnownBits::shl</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownBits &amp;RHS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NUW,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">                         </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NSW, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShAmtNonZero) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> = LHS.getBitWidth();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftByConst = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftAmt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">    KnownBits Known;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftedOutZero, ShiftedOutOne;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a> = LHS.Zero.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a97419fdddc400a50c7c40ef5c35903cd">ushl&#95;ov</a>(ShiftAmt, ShiftedOutZero);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ade8e20ecea1091e835395746448e262e">setLowBits</a>(ShiftAmt);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a> = LHS.One.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a97419fdddc400a50c7c40ef5c35903cd">ushl&#95;ov</a>(ShiftAmt, ShiftedOutOne);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All cases returning poison have been handled by MaxShiftAmount already.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NSW) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NUW &amp;&amp; ShiftAmt != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NUW means we can assume anything shifted out was a zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">        ShiftedOutZero = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShiftedOutZero)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">        Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a192e15f89a5aa04df018639812e2c4db">makeNonNegative</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShiftedOutOne)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">        Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a36d9168813b2a8415c085ac551c54458">makeNegative</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Known;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fast path for a common case when LHS is completely unknown.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">  KnownBits Known(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MinShiftAmount = RHS.getMinValue().getLimitedValue(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MinShiftAmount == 0 &amp;&amp; ShAmtNonZero)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">    MinShiftAmount = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.isUnknown()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ade8e20ecea1091e835395746448e262e">setLowBits</a>(MinShiftAmount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NUW &amp;&amp; NSW &amp;&amp; MinShiftAmount != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">      Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a192e15f89a5aa04df018639812e2c4db">makeNonNegative</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Known;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Determine maximum shift amount, taking NUW/NSW flags into account.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> MaxValue = RHS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a331d69b5f93e47e7c596062b77dd5913">getMaxValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxShiftAmount = <a href="#aa18696894909136556d40020664aefe1">getMaxShiftAmount</a>(MaxValue, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NUW &amp;&amp; NSW)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">    MaxShiftAmount = std::min(MaxShiftAmount, LHS.countMaxLeadingZeros() - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NUW)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">    MaxShiftAmount = std::min(MaxShiftAmount, LHS.countMaxLeadingZeros());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NSW)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">    MaxShiftAmount = std::min(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">        MaxShiftAmount,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::max(LHS.countMaxLeadingZeros(), LHS.countMaxLeadingOnes()) - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fast path for common case where the shift amount is unknown.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MinShiftAmount == 0 &amp;&amp; MaxShiftAmount == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> - 1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ade8e20ecea1091e835395746448e262e">setLowBits</a>(LHS.countMinTrailingZeros());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.isAllOnes())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">      Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a4f1e1a4449b58958c5884c689e7f4861">setSignBit</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">        Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a192e15f89a5aa04df018639812e2c4db">makeNonNegative</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.isNegative())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">        Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a36d9168813b2a8415c085ac551c54458">makeNegative</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the common bits from all possible shifts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftAmtZeroMask = RHS.Zero.zextOrTrunc(32).getZExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftAmtOneMask = RHS.One.zextOrTrunc(32).getZExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">  Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab6fff8a97bcb55e50e9be0ecf0c99b63">setAllBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">  Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab6fff8a97bcb55e50e9be0ecf0c99b63">setAllBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftAmt = MinShiftAmount; ShiftAmt &lt;= MaxShiftAmount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">       ++ShiftAmt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip if the shift amount is impossible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((ShiftAmtZeroMask &amp; ShiftAmt) != 0 ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">        (ShiftAmtOneMask | ShiftAmt) != ShiftAmt)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">    Known = Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a76e45a40f2f0b5b09132d1de119765e8">intersectWith</a>(ShiftByConst(LHS, ShiftAmt));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a28cf355963391ab8781b2347d495553d">isUnknown</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All shift amounts may result in poison.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a44875c6f48f6c843cf3114a19280b5ca">hasConflict</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4816b869391aac5bbcce9c889c2ecd97">setAllZero</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Known;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a5c34f40ce539320222a15a88ebcef716"><Highlight kind="normal">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a5c34f40ce539320222a15a88ebcef716">KnownBits::lshr</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownBits &amp;RHS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">                          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShAmtNonZero, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Exact) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> = LHS.getBitWidth();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftByConst = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShiftAmt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">    KnownBits Known = LHS;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af338e23a90c301183968435e80cd6a27">lshrInPlace</a>(ShiftAmt);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">    Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af338e23a90c301183968435e80cd6a27">lshrInPlace</a>(ShiftAmt);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// High bits are known zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::optional&lt;bool&gt;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LHS &gt;u RHS -&gt; true if umin(LHS) &gt; umax(RHS)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LHS.getMinValue().ugt(RHS.getMaxValue()))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac9384ac452485cfed65a93b238080793"><Highlight kind="normal">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac9384ac452485cfed65a93b238080793">KnownBits::abs</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IntMinIsPoison)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the source&#39;s MSB is zero then we know the rest of the bits already.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a157efd68e8b4b838829cad165b1583f8">isNonNegative</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Absolute value preserves trailing zero count.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">  KnownBits KnownAbs(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4fdc09049a61f952b5d52788dbd2f69b">getBitWidth</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the input is negative, then abs(x) == -x.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aabc0af41b4437080b27002ed7a1ed656">isNegative</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">    KnownBits Tmp = &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Special case for IntMinIsPoison. We know the sign bit is set and we know</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// all the rest of the bits except one to be zero. Since we have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// IntMinIsPoison, that final bit MUST be a one, as otherwise the input is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// INT&#95;MIN.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IntMinIsPoison &amp;&amp; (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.popcount() + 2) == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4fdc09049a61f952b5d52788dbd2f69b">getBitWidth</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal">      Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a33f9f862dca8ee0f23bff5941bf433d8">setBit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a1eeff70353694cb360b2893553c18e7d">countMinTrailingZeros</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">    KnownAbs = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a9c1c6dc178ce30e4a6c09f5c08727d65">computeForAddSub</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Add&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, IntMinIsPoison, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;NUW=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a066220c7a472d8793de64a0ad23487d2">KnownBits::makeConstant</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4fdc09049a61f952b5d52788dbd2f69b">getBitWidth</a>(), 0)), Tmp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// One more special case for IntMinIsPoison. If we don&#39;t know any ones other</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// than the signbit, we know for certain that all the unknowns can&#39;t be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// zero. So if we know high zero bits, but have unknown low bits, we know</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for certain those high-zero bits will end up as one. This is because,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the low bits can&#39;t be all zeros, so the 1 in (~x + 1) cannot carry up</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the high bits. If we know a known INT&#95;MIN input skip this. The result</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is poison anyways.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IntMinIsPoison &amp;&amp; Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ad2ecbbccee1ca4e3ddde24cc714ec79e">countMinPopulation</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">        Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4676f4bc7da9235ff3b6683dd670d7be">countMaxPopulation</a>() != 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">      Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af883359d8cdce0f853270b28d7bfc564">clearSignBit</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">      Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a4f1e1a4449b58958c5884c689e7f4861">setSignBit</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">      KnownAbs.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#acb95d5d8e87df053e1b53e2ec60de4b6">setBits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4fdc09049a61f952b5d52788dbd2f69b">getBitWidth</a>() - Tmp.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a7f47812e8e75b0616a97d7004e5fb909">countMinLeadingZeros</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">                           <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4fdc09049a61f952b5d52788dbd2f69b">getBitWidth</a>() - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxTZ = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a2ad6370e532a52014fe2e5a54bfbaddd">countMaxTrailingZeros</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MinTZ = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a1eeff70353694cb360b2893553c18e7d">countMinTrailingZeros</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal">    KnownAbs.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ade8e20ecea1091e835395746448e262e">setLowBits</a>(MinTZ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we know the lowest set 1, then preserve it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MaxTZ == MinTZ &amp;&amp; MaxTZ &lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a4fdc09049a61f952b5d52788dbd2f69b">getBitWidth</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">      KnownAbs.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a33f9f862dca8ee0f23bff5941bf433d8">setBit</a>(MaxTZ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We only know that the absolute values&#39;s MSB will be zero if INT&#95;MIN is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// poison, or there is a set bit that isn&#39;t the sign bit (otherwise it could</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be INT&#95;MIN).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IntMinIsPoison || (!<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.isZero() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.isMinSignedValue())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">      KnownAbs.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af883359d8cdce0f853270b28d7bfc564">clearSignBit</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal">      KnownAbs.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a4f1e1a4449b58958c5884c689e7f4861">setSignBit</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownAbs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a33a2235df9c9a82feea834f0955c2a4a">avgComputeU</a>(LHS, RHS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;IsCeil=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#abd85d08f35600dd19615a1efe9cacb1d"><Highlight kind="normal">KnownBits <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#abd85d08f35600dd19615a1efe9cacb1d">KnownBits::mul</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownBits &amp;LHS, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownBits &amp;RHS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><Highlight kind="normal">                         </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NoUndefSelfMultiply) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> = LHS.getBitWidth();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> == RHS.getBitWidth() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Operand mismatch&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!NoUndefSelfMultiply || LHS == RHS) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Self multiplication knownbits mismatch&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the high known-0 bits by multiplying the unsigned max of each side.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Conservatively, M active bits &#42; N active bits results in M + N bits in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// result. But if we know a value is a power-of-2 for example, then this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// computes one more leading zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: This could be generalized to number of sign bits (negative numbers).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> UMaxLHS = LHS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a331d69b5f93e47e7c596062b77dd5913">getMaxValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> UMaxRHS = RHS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a331d69b5f93e47e7c596062b77dd5913">getMaxValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For leading zeros in the result to be valid, the unsigned max product must</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fit in the bitwidth (it must not overflow).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasOverflow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> UMaxResult = UMaxLHS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a028f4d1eead63cc33499ce3459bd27c7">umul&#95;ov</a>(UMaxRHS, HasOverflow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LeadZ = HasOverflow ? 0 : UMaxResult.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a8bad27827f46bca6baf814cbd2b64e84">countl&#95;zero</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The result of the bottom bits of an integer multiply can be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inferred by looking at the bottom bits of both operands and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// multiplying them together.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can infer at least the minimum number of known trailing bits</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of both operands. Depending on number of trailing zeros, we can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// infer more bits, because (a&#42;b) &lt;=&gt; ((a/m) &#42; (b/n)) &#42; (m&#42;n) assuming</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a and b are divisible by m and n respectively.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We then calculate how many of those bits are inferrable and set</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the output. For example, the i8 mul:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  a = XXXX1100 (12)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  b = XXXX1110 (14)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We know the bottom 3 bits are zero since the first can be divided by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 4 and the second by 2, thus having ((12/4) &#42; (14/2)) &#42; (2&#42;4).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Applying the multiplication to the trimmed arguments gets:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    XX11 (3)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    X111 (7)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -------</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    XX11</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   XX11</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  XX11</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// XX11</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -------</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// XXXXX01</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Which allows us to infer the 2 LSBs. Since we&#39;re multiplying the result</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by 8, the bottom 3 bits will be 0, so we can infer a total of 5 bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The proof for this can be described as:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pre: (C1 &gt;= 0) &amp;&amp; (C1 &lt; (1 &lt;&lt; C5)) &amp;&amp; (C2 &gt;= 0) &amp;&amp; (C2 &lt; (1 &lt;&lt; C6)) &amp;&amp;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      (C7 == (1 &lt;&lt; (umin(countTrailingZeros(C1), C5) +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                    umin(countTrailingZeros(C2), C6) +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                    umin(C5 - umin(countTrailingZeros(C1), C5),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                         C6 - umin(countTrailingZeros(C2), C6)))) - 1)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %aa = shl i8 %a, C5</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %bb = shl i8 %b, C6</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %aaa = or i8 %aa, C1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %bbb = or i8 %bb, C2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %mul = mul i8 %aaa, %bbb</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %mask = and i8 %mul, C7</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   =&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %mask = i8 ((C1&#42;C2)&amp;C7)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Where C5, C6 describe the known bits of %a, %b</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// C1, C2 describe the known bottom bits of %a, %b.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// C7 describes the mask of the known bits of the result.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Bottom0 = LHS.One;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Bottom1 = RHS.One;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// How many times we&#39;d be able to divide each argument by 2 (shr by 1).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This gives us the number of trailing zeros on the multiplication result.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TrailBitsKnown0 = (LHS.Zero | LHS.One).<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a239abca11deebf2731206dd41cf43c0e">countr&#95;one</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TrailBitsKnown1 = (RHS.Zero | RHS.One).<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a239abca11deebf2731206dd41cf43c0e">countr&#95;one</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TrailZero0 = LHS.countMinTrailingZeros();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TrailZero1 = RHS.countMinTrailingZeros();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TrailZ = TrailZero0 + TrailZero1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Figure out the fewest known-bits operand.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SmallestOperand =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::min(TrailBitsKnown0 - TrailZero0, TrailBitsKnown1 - TrailZero1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResultBitsKnown = std::min(SmallestOperand + TrailZ, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> BottomKnown =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="normal">      Bottom0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a0fa9845f80fa0642b31c238f4ab0d5ef">getLoBits</a>(TrailBitsKnown0) &#42; Bottom1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a0fa9845f80fa0642b31c238f4ab0d5ef">getLoBits</a>(TrailBitsKnown1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="normal">  KnownBits Res(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal">  Res.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a2780c5606880394d3f07cd2079a27697">setHighBits</a>(LeadZ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal">  Res.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a> |= (~BottomKnown).getLoBits(ResultBitsKnown);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="normal">  Res.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a> = BottomKnown.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a0fa9845f80fa0642b31c238f4ab0d5ef">getLoBits</a>(ResultBitsKnown);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we&#39;re self-multiplying then bit&#91;1&#93; is guaranteed to be zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NoUndefSelfMultiply &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> &gt; 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Res.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#aba205f553f24c184ea47fc1a6cb56537">One</a>&#91;1&#93; == 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Self-multiplication failed Quadratic Reciprocity!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><Highlight kind="normal">    Res = (Num.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a1f04e382556a817950fd0390aeaf9b0e">isMinSignedValue</a>() &amp;&amp; Denom.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a423e2c491de1408d54e35f0b47d076be">isAllOnes</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can figure out the minimum number of upper zero bits by doing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MaxNumerator / MinDenominator. If the Numerator gets smaller or Denominator</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// gets larger, the number of upper zero bits increases.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> MinDenom = RHS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a65a6479206acd4113b8aa1c0fbc2158c">getMinValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> MaxRes = MinDenom.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a49cd5939942c6665aba4cae8c220dff1">isZero</a>() ? MaxNum : MaxNum.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a05d674becc60ba4ef8cd4dd4d38ac27a">udiv</a>(MinDenom);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ae2632149f66b099426f2dcff58ed93b7"><Highlight kind="normal">KnownBits &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ae2632149f66b099426f2dcff58ed93b7">KnownBits::operator^=</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KnownBits &amp;RHS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
